sentences: A native of Seattle, Washington, Mastro graduated from the University of Washington at the age of nineteen.
As a television producer, she worked on the reality series Pussycat Dolls Present.
In 2008, she directed the short film Matter starring Amanda Righetti.
In 2011, she directed the short film Bench Seat starring Cassie Scerbo and written by Neil LaBute.
In 2012, she directed the Gossip Girl episode "Save the Last Chance", one of the final four episodes of the series.
